sentence.Network_en: Seventy-four years after the Bolshevik Revolution, the Soviet era ended.
sentence.Network_cn: 在布尔什维克革命爆发的74年之后，苏维埃时代终结了。

sentence.Network_en: The Bolshevik coup in October 1917 was the outcome of the transformation of Marxism into Leninism.
sentence.Network_cn: 1917年10月发生的布尔什维克政变是马克思主义转变成列宁主义的结果.

entry.tran: 布尔什维克的；布尔什维克主义的
entry.def: Bolshevik is used to describe the political system and ideas that Lenin and his supporters introduced in Russia after the Russian Revolution of 1917.

example.ex: Seventy-four years after the Bolshevik Revolution, the Soviet era ended.
example.tran: 在布尔什维克革命爆发的74年之后，苏维埃时代终结了。

entry.tran: 布尔什维克；布尔什维克主义者
entry.def: A Bolshevik was a person who supported Lenin and his political ideas.

means.word_mean: 1. emotionally charged terms used to refer to extreme radicals or revolutionaries
2. a Russian member of the left-wing majority group that followed Lenin and eventually became the Russian communist party
